CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Ticket Purchase stage positioned above or below the Post-Event Feedback stage?
SRP.A: The Ticket Purchase stage is positioned {above} the Post-Event Feedback stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Fan Engagement?
VE.A: The value of stage Fan Engagement is {285}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Event Attendance?
VE.A: The value of stage Event Attendance is {477}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Event Feedback?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Event Feedback is {207}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Event Announcement, with a value of {912}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Event Reattendance, with a value of {133}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Event Feedback to stage Merchandise Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {57} Participants from stage Post-Event Feedback to stage Merchandise Purchase.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Ticket Purchase to stage Event Attendance?
SC.A: Decreased by {145} Participants from stage Ticket Purchase to stage Event Attendance.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Fan Engagement to stage Post-Event Feedback?
SC.A: Decreased by {78} Participants from stage Fan Engagement to stage Post-Event Feedback.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 381? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Event Announcement} stage has {912}, the {Ticket Purchase} stage has {622}, the {Event Attendance} stage has {477}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 178? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Merchandise Purchase} stage has {150}, the {Event Reattendance} stage has {133}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 246 and 381? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Ticket Purchase to Event Attendance, or from stage Event Attendance to Fan Engagement?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Event Attendance} to {Fan Engagement} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Fan Engagement to Post-Event Feedback, from stage Merchandise Purchase to Event Reattendance, or from stage Event Announcement to Ticket Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Event Announcement} to stage {Ticket Purchase} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Post-Event Feedback to Merchandise Purchase, from stage Ticket Purchase to Event Attendance, or from stage Event Attendance to Fan Engagement?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Event Attendance} to stage {Fan Engagement} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Event Announcement} and {Ticket Purchase} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Merchandise Purchase} and {Event Reattendance} stages.
